scripts.gen_proof: rm -rf build/proof && mkdir build/proof && npx snarkjs calculatewitness -c build/circuit/merkle_tree.json -i input.json -w build/proof/witness.json --lo && snarkjs proof -w build/proof/witness.json --public build/proof/public.json --pk build/circuit/merkle_tree_proving_key.json -p build/proof/proof.json
scripts.build:circuit:compile: npx circom circuit/merkle_tree.circom -o build/circuit/merkle_tree.json && npx snarkjs info -c build/circuit/merkle_tree.json
scripts.build:circuit: mkdir -p build/circuit && npm run build:circuit:compile && npm run build:circuit:setup && npm run build:circuit:bin && npm run build:gen_proof
scripts.build:verifier: asc assembly/groth16-verify/main.ts -b assembly/groth16-verify/out/main.wasm -t assembly/groth16-verify/out/main.wat --validate && cd assembly/groth16-verify && gulp
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:circuit && npm run build:verifier
